title: Major winter storm slams Midwest
text:
Major winter storm slams Midwest 1:56pm GMT - 00:35 
A major winter storm barrels through the U.S. Midwest dumping heavy snow and dropping temperatures to well below freezing, forcing schools to close and threatening to leave travel at a stand still. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A major winter storm barrels through the U.S. Midwest dumping heavy snow and dropping temperatures to well below freezing, forcing schools to close and threatening to leave travel at a stand still. Linda So reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sm2EHQ
